question:
You are working in a school. Write a letter to the Principal to recommend your friend for the position of sports teacher in your school. In your letter


– say how long you have known him/her
– describe his/her qualifications
– explain why you think he/she would be suitable for the job.
text: I am writing this letter with regards to the open position of sports teacher . Hence, I would like to recommend one of my childhood friends who knows me since my school days. In addition, we both did our schooling and graduated from the same institutions.

He has completed his master's degree in a reputed university in the United States of America and secured a gold medal in  physical sports presentations. Furthermore, he also contributed his knowledge and extended support to the national-level sports committee and selections as well.

Therefore,  I strongly believe that, he is the best in sports activities despite his academic top  records. Furthermore, he has done  phenomenal participation in all the games and this would be an immaculate asset to our school and students as well. However, Undoubtedly, the profound experience that he is having would be priceless in the market.
I look forward to hearing an update on this letter and I hope it will come soon.
